name: On the Scrounge
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Loot pickup rewards increased by 15%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Primary and Secondary ammo capacity lowered by 20%.[/color]

name: No Backups
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Player reload speed increased by 15%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- No secondary weapon (ammo capacity lowered by 100%)[/color]

name: This is Gonna Hurt
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Enemies take 15% more damage.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Bleedout timer reduced to 15 seconds.[/color]

name: Not in the Face!
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Critical chances increased by 10%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Headshots don't do damage.[/color]

name: Loaded for Bear
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Primary and Secondary ammo capacity increased by 20%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- All movement speeds reduced by 15%.[/color]

name: Total Carnage!
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Ammo pickups refill grenades.
+ Every enemy is dismembered.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Enemies vulnerable only to explosions and melee.[/color]

name: Switch Hitter
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Shooting your secondary weapon fills up your primary ammo.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Shooting your primary weapon consumes both primary and secondary ammo.[/color]

name: Gunslingers
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Pistol damage increased by 15%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- No primary weapon. (ammo capacity lowered by 100%)[/color]

name: Fresh Troops
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Loot drop chance increased by 25%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Enemies have 50% more Health.[/color]

name: Don't You Die On Me!
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Bleedout timer increased by 10 seconds.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- None of the players can ever die during the raid.[/color]

name: No Second Chances
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Player Health is increased by 10.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- None of the players can ever go to bleedout during the raid.[/color]

name: A Perfect Score
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ All chests are locked with greater rewards.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Challenge card rewards are nullified when failing a minigame.[/color]

name: Helmet Shortage
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Headshots are instant kill.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Player Health is reduced by 50%.[/color]

name: Hemorrhaging
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Every melee kill regenerates 10% health.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- 20% health drained per minute.[/color]

name: Crab People
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Player movement speed is greatly increased.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- You can only walk backwards or sideways (strafe).[/color]

name: Slasher movie
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Melee damage is increased.
+ Health is regenerated over time.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Player can only use a melee weapon.
- Warcries are disabled.[/color]

name: Pumpkin pie
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Headshot damage increased by 100%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Attacking is possible only while in air.[/color]

name: Season of resurrection
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Damage output greatly increased on low HP.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- There is no bleedout
- Players can only be revived by others destroying a special pumpkin.[/color]

name: Limited Supplies
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Loot pickup rewards increased by 15%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Primary and Secondary ammo capacity lowered by 20%.[/color]

name: Take the Cannoli
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ No movement penalties for carrying heavy objects.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Enemy loot drop chances lowered by 15%.[/color]

name: Real Tough Guys
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Bleedout timer increased by 5 seconds.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Enemies have 10% more Health.[/color]

name: Nichtsplosions
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Player reload speed increased by 15%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Enemies are impervious to explosive damage.[/color]

name: War Weary
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Enemies take 10% more damage.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Loot pickup rewards reduced by 25%.[/color]

name: Special Delivery
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Player movement speed is greatly increased.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Special enemies deal 50% more damage.[/color]

name: Don't Blink
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Loot drop chance increased by 10%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Enemy loot drops disappear after 5 seconds.[/color]

name: Bad Coffee
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Player reload speed increased by 10%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Bleedout timer reduced to 15 seconds.[/color]

name: Playing for Keeps
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Enemies take 10% more damage.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Player Health is reduced by 25.[/color]

name: Silent Shout
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Every melee kill regenerates 10% health.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Fails if player uses a Warcry.[/color]

name: Blow Me
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Grenade damage increased by 100%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Primary and Secondary ammo capacity lowered by 50%.[/color]

name: You Only Live Once
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Health regenerates 5% on every kill.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- None of the players can ever die during the duration of the operation.[/color]

name: Controlled Bursts
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Critical chances increased by 7%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Must be completed without any player emptying the magazine of any weapon.[/color]

name: Elite Opponents
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Loot drop chance increased by 25%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Enemies have 50% more Health.[/color]

name: Headaches For All
description:
[color=#70b35b]+ Headshot damage increased by 50%.[/color]
[color=#de4a3e]- Enemies vulnerable only to headshots.[/color]

name: I have trust in my aim
description: Enemy has 2x life, player has 21% more headshot damage

name: Engineering
description: You are not allowed to fail an interaction wheel minigame, but there are no barrages

name: It's all in your head
description: Enemies only die from headshots, but you regen 2% life every 5 seconds

name: Ze glass cannons!
description: Enemies does x2 ammount of damage, but they have 50% less health

name: Where's the health!?
description: Health drops despawn after 10 seconds, but player reload speed is 25% faster

name: Double damage for them, but more xp for me
description: Enemies do x3 ammount of damage, but you get 210% xp

name: No snipers, no cry
description: The bleedout timer is 14 seconds shorter, but there will be no snipers

name: One bullet at a time
description: Enemies take 20% more damage, but the players can only shoot with single fire

name: Fast and furious
description: Complete the raid within 14 minutes, but your grenades have increased radius by 4 meters

name: Lighter for nothing
description: All bags weight 50% less, but no enemies will drop ammo or health

name: The fast spender
description: Bags do not slow you down, but every bullet fired counts as 2 bullets

name: Explosive weakness
description: Enemies do not take explosive damage, but they do 50% less damage in general

name: Double damage for them, but more xp for me
description: Players can't ever go into bleedout, but they will earn 200% XP

name: Greedy bastards
description: The loot drop chance from enemies is lowered to 40%, but players have 50% more primary ammo

name: Scavengers
description: The drop chance from enemies is 0, but enemies take 50% mora damage

name: Fully loaded pistol!
description: Players can only use pistols, but you can carry 300% of secondary ammo
